[[$reviewText_tmpl: redefined in /if/customReview_tmpl/reviewText_tmpl]   Specialties: Tandoori mixed grill; tandoori lobster; butter chicken; rack of lamb marinated in yogurt; lamb cooked in pickled spices. For more than a decade, Amber India and Vijay Bist have served some of the best Indian food in the Bay Area. A couple of years ago, Bist opened a second location on Santana Row in San Jose, but the Mountain View restaurant still retains its soul.
